subject: p13078497
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there is continued substantial enlargement of the cardiac silhouette with diffuse bilateral pulmonary opacifications consistent with worsening pulmonary edema and bilateral pleural effusion. An endotracheal tube is now in place with its tip approximately 6 cm above the carina. Nasogastric tube extends at least to the antrum of the stomach where it crosses the lower margin of the image.
